item.name: /user-microservice/api/v2/user/role
item.description: This endpoint updates the details of an existing role. The role ID is used to identify the role to be updated.The update operation can modify the role's name, type, and permissions.

request.description: This endpoint updates the details of an existing role. The role ID is used to identify the role to be updated.The update operation can modify the role's name, type, and permissions.

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user
item.description: This endpoint performs an updates operation on a user account based on the provided parametersThis update operation can span multiple services on specific cases (such as when the client is explicitly attempting to update the email of the user)All update operations are atomic by nature hence we should not expect any form of divergent state

request.description: This endpoint performs an updates operation on a user account based on the provided parametersThis update operation can span multiple services on specific cases (such as when the client is explicitly attempting to update the email of the user)All update operations are atomic by nature hence we should not expect any form of divergent state

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/:userId
item.description: This endpoint performs a delete operation on a user account based on the provided parametersThis deletion operation spans multiple services as user details are stored across a suite of our backend servicesThe operation itself is an atomic one of nature. Either all services successfully delete the recod or we fail the requestDivergent state is not expected to be encountered with this endpoint.

variable.description: The account ID associated with the user to delete Validations: - user_id must be greater than 0

request.description: This endpoint performs a delete operation on a user account based on the provided parametersThis deletion operation spans multiple services as user details are stored across a suite of our backend servicesThe operation itself is an atomic one of nature. Either all services successfully delete the recod or we fail the requestDivergent state is not expected to be encountered with this endpoint.

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/:userId
item.description: Queries and obtains a user account based on the provided parameters

variable.description: The account ID associated with the user Validations: - user_id must be greater than 0

request.description: Queries and obtains a user account based on the provided parameters

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/email/:email
item.description: Queries and obtains a user account based on the email

item.name: Gets a user account by email

variable.description: The email of the user of interest

request.description: Queries and obtains a user account based on the email

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/email/:email/exists
item.description: Checks if an email exists or not

item.name: Checks that an email exists or not

variable.description: The email of the user of interest

request.description: Checks if an email exists or not

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/health
item.description: This endpoint performs a healc check on the service

request.description: This endpoint performs a healc check on the service

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/query-account-by-email-or-username
item.description: This endpoint returns a user account by either provided email or username

item.name: gets a user account by either email or username

request.description: This endpoint returns a user account by either provided email or username

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/query-id
item.description: This endpoint returns the user record id if the user record exists example: /api/v1/user-service?email=testuser@gmail.com&&username=testuser

request.description: This endpoint returns the user record id if the user record exists example: /api/v1/user-service?email=testuser@gmail.com&&username=testuser

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/ready
item.description: This endpoint performs a readiness check on the service

request.description: This endpoint performs a readiness check on the service

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/username/:username
item.description: Queries and obtains a user account based on the username

item.name: Gets a user account by user name

variable.description: The username of the user of interest

request.description: Queries and obtains a user account based on the username

item.description: Checks if a username exists or not

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/verification/:userId
item.description: This endpoint performs verification of a user account email

request.description: This endpoint performs verification of a user account email

item.name: /user-microservice/api/v1/user-service/user/webhook/password-reset
item.description: This endpoint performs password reset for a given user account

request.description: This endpoint performs password reset for a given user account
